Worcester.Fitton Field:
Fitton Field is a multi-purpose sports stadium in Worcester, Massachusetts. Primarily used for College of the Holy Cross sporting events, the baseball stadium also served as the home field for the Can-Am League Worcester Tornadoes, and the current home of the Futures Collegiate Baseball League Worcester Bravehearts.


== History and layout ==
The stadium opened in 1924 as the official home for the Holy Cross Crusaders.
